description:
Look at Graphic & Web Design in a Different Way. See Design from a New Perspective. I'm opening my data driven design playbook and sharing my perspective through the art of storytelling. Remember, you are learning a mindset! This new mindset will help strengthen things you learn in other courses.

Did you know Dolphins use tools and transmit cultural knowledge across generations? And their considerable intelligence has driven interaction with humans! Be the Dolphin in today's internet sea of noise.

Dive deep and QUICKLY learn how to:

  • Design websites and graphics differently
  • Spend less money on a new website or design project
  • Gather website data ... then customer and client leads
  • Intrigue & engage your client with real-time website analytics
  • Easily build and manage an effective web presence without coding skills
  • Know more about your client's website audience than they do
  • Find untapped niche markets in your area

You don't have to be gifted with creativity to design or manage an effective website! Need proof? In this course, I'll provide Real World examples that are worth the course fee alone.

The design knowledge you gain can be used to start your own web business, help people and businesses with an existing website or simply use as a checklist to give your current "designer".

There are many courses out there where you can learn to do "cool" & "creative" things. This is not one of those courses. Although fancy fonts, pretty pics, and vivid videos have their place, this course focuses only on the details and eye-opening analytics behind the design. Plus I'm taking a non-stuffy, fun approach to learning this material. Let's laugh and learn! Ready?
title: Be the "Dolphin" of Designers
